episodes.title: Understanding Cult-like Dynamics in Narcissistic Families: Insights from Steve Hassan's BITE Model
episodes.description:
The call to action is: Download the Reports for The Scapegoat & Narcissistic Abuse Recovery Course + 45pg Healing Toolkit here: https://blaketherapy.ca/the-ultimate-toolkit

Join Blake Anderson, a seasoned social worker and therapist, as he delves into the parallels between cult dynamics and narcissistic family structures. Drawing from Steve Hassan's 'BITE Model'—Behavior, Information, Thought, and Emotions—Blake explores how narcissistic parents manipulate and control their family members, mirroring cult-like behavior. Learn how these dynamics can manifest in behaviors, information control, emotional fusion, and suppression of individual thoughts. Discover the psychological impact this has on children, particularly the 'scapegoat,' and understand the importance of setting boundaries and seeking autonomy. An essential watch for those seeking to recognize and break free from toxic family patterns.
